product.name: Physicians Formula Shimmer Strips Extreme Shimmer Eyeliner Trio in Nude
product.description: This Physicians Formula Shimmer Strips Extreme Shimmer Eyeliner Trio gives you highly pigmented color and bold shimmer for a glamorous customized look. Features: Long wearing, water resistant and smudge resistant formula for 24hr wearHypoallergenicParaben & gluten freeDermatologist approvedSafe for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearerDirections: Apply eyeliner at the base of upper shade, layer shades for endless looks.Ingredients: Dimethicone, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Polyethylene, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Synthetic Wax, Squalane, Polybutene, Silica, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Propylene Carbonate, Tin Oxide, Lecithin, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Citric Acid. May Contain/Peut Contenir: Bismuth Oxychloride, Black 2, Blue 1 Lake, Chromium Hydroxide Green, Chromium Oxide Greens, Carmine, Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide, Ferric Ferrocyanide, Iron Oxides, Manganese Violet, Mica, Titanium Dioxide, Ultramarines, Yellow 5 Lake.
